mapper.insert: insert into DB_STO_STODTL (WHID, LOCT, OWNRKY, LOCAKY, SKUKEY, DESC01, DESC02, STOQTY, WEIGHT, STOCK_STS, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTM, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DTM) values (#{whid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownrky,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locaky,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skukey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stoqty,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{weight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{stockSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update DB_STO_STODTL set OWNRKY = #{ownrky,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCAKY = #{locaky,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUKEY = #{skukey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESC01 = #{desc01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESC02 = #{desc02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOQTY = #{stoqty,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, STOCK_STS = #{stockSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_USER_ID = #{regUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_DTM = #{regDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MOD_USER_ID = #{modUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOD_DTM = #{modDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where WHID = #{whid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and LOCT = #{loct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select WHID, LOCT, OWNRKY, LOCAKY, SKUKEY, DESC01, DESC02, STOQTY, WEIGHT, STOCK_STS, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTM, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DTM from DB_STO_STODTL
